definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: He reportedly had three sons and two daughters.
sentences.chinese: 據報導，溥任膝下有三子二女。

sentences.english: State media reported that Shahram Amiri was asking for a quick return to Tehran.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗國家媒體報導說，阿米里要求迅速返回德黑蘭。

sentences.english: In Egypt, there have been reports of street protests over the cost of tomatoes.
sentences.chinese: 在埃及也有報導過，因爲番茄價格而有人上街抗議。

sentences.english: At present, the age of storm deposits reported in China may be traced back to late proterozoic.
sentences.chinese: 目前我國已報導的風暴沉積時代可追溯到晚元古代。

sentences.english: He says that the report is libellous.
Then he was profiled by the mainland's print media in both Chinese and English.
sentences.chinese: 然後大陸的中英文平面媒體報導了他。

sentences.english: The results of vitro rapid propagation of Dendrocalamus asper are reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文報導了馬來甜龍竹組培快繁的研究結果。

sentences.english: The paper also reports some data about sexual maturity, reproduction rate, etc.
sentences.chinese: 此外，本文還報導了一些有關性成熟和產羔率等資料。

sentences.english: This story has been viewed 306 times.
or Raman reporter molecule immobilized metallic nanoparticles.
sentences.chinese: 拉曼，報導了固定化的分子金屬納米粒。

sentences.english: Jalloud is the third top defection reported in a week.
sentences.chinese: 據報導，賈盧德是一星期內第三位叛變的高級官員。

sentences.english: This paper reported a study on the purification and preliminary analysis of polysaccharides of Opuntia Vulgaris Mill.
sentences.chinese: 本文報導了仙人掌多糖的分離純化及初步分析。

sentences.english: Electrode selection for oxidation of cerium by cation ion-exchange membran electrolysis in sulfuric acid solution was reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 報導了硫酸介質中電解氧化鈰的陰陽極選擇。

sentences.english: A simple method to generate a hollow laser beam by multimode fiber is reported.
sentences.chinese: 文中報導了一種用多模光纖產生空心光束方法。

definition: Taoyuan city and county in Taiwan
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
Dagong Bao, popular newspaper name/Ta Kung Pao, newspaper founded 1902 in Beijing, now published in Hong Kong
to interview (a particular person or on a particular topic)/special interview/special report based on such an interview
to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
Yilan city and county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], northeast Taiwan
variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
variant of 計劃|计划[ji4 hua4]
